item.description:
Due to popular demand, the NEBBC's Drop-In Obedience Class has been extended until October!

ALL breeds are welcome at this innovative course which covers all of the Canine Good Citizen steps, as well as minor problem behaviors, tricks, agility and canine freestyle elements!

As the weather cools down, we will be focusing on more high energy material! (i.e. long distance recalls, jumps, fast-paced heel-work, etc.)...  No matter your breed, catch the training bug and join us for a good time with fantastic certified instructors, displaying our dogs in a positive light! 

Please bring: a variety of SUPER-good dog treats (cheese, hot dog, really great bagged treats, freeze-dried liver, etc.); a fully-vaccinated dog; collar or harness of preference. $15 donation per dog/per class required. Will accept cash, check or money order payable to the New England Bully Breed Club.

NO flexi/extendable leashes.  You will be rented a 4-6 foot for A $5 fee.

Thank you so much! Hope to see you there!

Check us out on facebook for complete photo-diary of classes!
item.how_to_find_us: Bullies, bullies, everywhere. Please park on the side of the road.
item.name: All Breed Drop-In Prep/Refresher Obedience and CGC Class Extended!
